definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="xp">xp</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="131" y="-56"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:xp</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_xplevel"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_while"><value name="BOOL"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:xp</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">магии</field></block></value><next><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.25</field></block></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
